scripts.deploy: xcopy /Y /E build\* ..\ai-explorer-dist\ai-explorer && cd ..\ai-explorer-dist\ai-explorer && git add . && git commit -am"Next commit" && git push origin master
scripts.deploy-dev: xcopy /Y /E build\* ..\ai-explorer-dist-dev\ai-explorer-dev && cd ..\ai-explorer-dist-dev\ai-explorer-dev && git add . && git commit -am"Next commit" && git push origin master
